divs: Sighting DetailsOur dog was barking at the door so my wife went to the door and said there was something in the sky it was huvering just above the tree line. It was about the size of a boeing airplane in the middle of it was a glowing florissant light which was the middle of it.It would stop and huver and then move off very slow, It had a deep red light that wuold come on ever five minutes on top of it,thin i saw about four airplanes that WAS following it and then they brook off like they got scared are something it finly moved off over the tree line.
